jGame.loop.timer

Class TimerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • jGame.loop.timer.TimerManager

  • public class TimerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    the manager of timers in a game thread
    See Also:
    Timer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TimerManager()
      create a timerManager with no render and update
      TimerManager(Render render, Update update)
      create a timerManager with Render and Update

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTimer(Timer timer)
      add a timer to the thread, and the timer will be called if the thread have time
      void cleanTimer()
      [auto call] remove timers which was made to be removed in removeTimer()
      void cleanToBeAddedList()
      [auto call] add timers which was made to be added in addTimer()
      java.util.ArrayList<Timer> getFullList()
      get the timer list with update and render in front of them
      Render getRender()
      get the render of this thread
      java.util.ArrayList<Timer> getTimers()
      get the timer list of this thread
      Update getUpdate()
      get the update of this thread
      void removeTimer(Timer timer)
      remove a timer from the thread, and it will not be called from that thread

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        create a timerManager with no render and update

      • TimerManager

        public TimerManager(Render render,
                    Update update)
        create a timerManager with Render and Update
        Parameters:
        render - the Render of the game
        update - the Update of the game

    • Method Detail

      • addTimer

        public void addTimer(Timer timer)
        add a timer to the thread, and the timer will be called if the thread have time
        Parameters:
        timer - the timer to be added to the thread

      • removeTimer

        public void removeTimer(Timer timer)
        remove a timer from the thread, and it will not be called from that thread
        Parameters:
        timer - the timer to be removed from the thread

      • getTimers

        public java.util.ArrayList<Timer> getTimers()
        get the timer list of this thread
        Returns:
        the timer list

      • getFullList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Timer> getFullList()

        Returns:
        the full list

      • getRender

        get the render of this thread
        Returns:

        public void cleanToBeAddedList()
